meaningMnemonic:
You know that 学校 means school. So, people who are in the <kanji>middle</kanji> <kanji>school</kanji> are in... wait for it... <vocabulary>middle school</vocabulary>. 

And, of course, if you're one of those people that call it <vocabulary>junior high school</vocabulary> you can do that too.
readingMnemonic: The reading is a combination of 学校 and 中. Really, it's all on'yomi too, so you should be able to read this one. Take note of the がく turning to がっ, though.
